data.text: @HBC4MAYOR So incredibly sad to see these darling children have to endure this and my blood boils thinking of these pathetic whiners in Canada who continue to humiliate us in the face of the world
@HBC4MAYOR Yes! All of these whiners on both sides of the border look more pathetic to be sure. They should be shamed into crawling back into their hovels. 🤬
@HBC4MAYOR Wow you are a fucking clown
